sense.name: 地方, local authority,
sense.examples:
民族自治地方。
national autonomous area.
中央和地方的关系。
The relationship between the central and the local authorities.

sense.name: 地方, local,
sense.examples:
地方保护主义。
local protectionism
地方报刊。
local press

sense.name: 地方, 地区，region, regional,
sense.examples:
人口稠密的地区。
The densely populated regions.
地方色彩。
regionalism

sense.name: 地方, place, space,
sense.examples:
把它挂在通风的地方。
Hang it in an airy place.
他不会占很多地方。
It will not occupy much space.

sense.name: 地方, 部分，part,
sense.examples:
剧中最动人的部分。
The most touching part of the play.
我喜欢小说的有些地方。
I like some parts of the story.

sense.name: 地方, 地点, site, location, locale,
sense.examples:
故事发生的地方。
The locale of a story.
适合办商业网点的地方。
Suitable location for a shop.

sense.name: 地方, district,
sense.examples:
地方医院。
a district hospital
地方法院
district court

sense.name: 地方, 地区，area,
sense.examples:
水灾地区。
a flood-affected area
住宅地区。
residential areas

sense.name: 地方, 地点, 地址，address,
sense.examples:
他已换了地方。
He has changed his address.
请你搬了家把地址告诉我。
Please let me have your address as soon as you are settled.
